multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates; Fed policy signals and inflation data influence US Treasury yields and the dollar, while the crypto rally introduces a new asset class.

category.motivation: Fed Chair Jerome Powell signaled possible rate cuts, indicating a forthcoming central bank policy change.
